Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is partly covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of three lines of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394524) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394524)
